name: rideminderserver
description: Authenticated GraphQL endpoint configured with schema.

scripts.dev-setup: sudo npm i -g commitizen && npm run build-cache-update
scripts.dev-pgdata-clear: npm run docker-dev-down && sudo rm -rf dev-cache/dev-pgdata
scripts.test-pgdata-clear: npm run docker-test-down && sudo rm -rf dev-cache/test-pgdata
scripts.pgdata-clear: npm run test-pgdata-clear && npm run dev-pgdata-clear
scripts.build-cache-update: mkdir -p dev-cache  && wget -O dev-cache/yarn-latest.tar.gz https://yarnpkg.com/latest.tar.gz && mkdir -p dev-cache/yarn-latest && tar zvxf dev-cache/yarn-latest.tar.gz -C dev-cache/yarn-latest --strip-components=1 && touch yarn.lock && test -e dev-cache/yarn-latest/bin/yarn
scripts.pretest: npm run build && docker stop test-rmgs && npm run docker-test-up
scripts.test: npm run docker-test-exec -- npm run test-in-container && npm run docker-test-exec xo
scripts.docker-dev-restart: npm run docker-dev-down && npm run docker-dev-up
scripts.docker-dev-reload: npm run build && npm run docker-dev-restart

author: Lindsay Pallickal
